# Prompt Library

All custom GitHub Copilot prompts organized by category. All prompts live in this directory (flat structure) for easy access.

## ğŸ¯ Usage

Reference prompts by their simple names (without `.prompt.md` suffix):

```
@workspace /literature search for quantum mechanics in my library
@workspace /lyra optimize this prompt for Claude
@workspace /recommend_chatmode what's best for my current task?
```

## ğŸ“ Privacy Policy

- **Public Prompts**: Only files with `-live` suffix are shared publicly
